reviewText: Lemon Jefferson's idiosyncratic song arrangements are tasty little gems. Arie Eisinger walks you through Lemon classics in A, C and E, note for note (literally).  It's a bit overwhelming at times but well worth the effort.  Lemon used the full fretboard, so in addition to getting a handle on these tunes, you will be learning how to get around on the instrument.  Want to know where Lightning Hopkins and Freddie King got their moves?  Check out Lemon.
